*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to colonists, August 28, 1826. Calling an election.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*In complyance with the law of the Legislature of this *location_mentioned*State */location_mentioned*passed the *date_mentioned n="07-29-1826">29 of July last*/date_mentioned* providing for elections and in obedience to the order of the *person_mentioned*chief of the Department of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* for the election from this *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*of the number of *person_mentioned*primary electors */person_mentioned*which the population of this *location_mentioned*jurisdiction */location_mentioned*entitles it to in conformity with said law Notice is hereby given that an election will be held in the Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* on *date_mentioned n="09-02-1826">Saturday the 2d day of September*/date_mentioned* next by all the *person_mentioned*Inhabitants */person_mentioned*of this *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*for four *person_mentioned*electors */person_mentioned*to proceed to *location_mentioned*San Antonio de Bexar */location_mentioned*so as to arrive there by the *date_mentioned n="09-06-1826">6 of Sept*/date_mentioned*. to give their votes in the *location_mentioned*electoral college*/location_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*Department of Texas*/location_mentioned* for the purpose of electing *person_mentioned*electors */person_mentioned*to the *person_mentioned*college of electors*/person_mentioned* of the *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*which is to convene in *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*the first *date_mentioned n="10-08-1826">Sunday in October next*/date_mentioned* for the purpose of electing a *person_mentioned*member of the national congress */person_mentioned*from this *location_mentioned*state*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="08-28-1826">Aug. 28. 1826*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/p*
*p*Note—The law and order for this election was not recd by me until this day owing to the failure of one mail *location_mentioned*between Saltillo and San Antonio*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
